[[File:Xavier Fernique.jpg|thumb|220px|Xavier Fernique]]
'''Xavier Fernique''' is a [[mathematician]], noted mostly for his contributions to the theory of [[stochastic processes]].  [[Fernique's theorem]], a result on the [[Integrable system|integrability]] of [[Gaussian measure]]s, is named after him.
